statements: SELECT * FROM account_activity WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM account_activity WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, activity_timestamp FROM account_activity WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM account_activity WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT account_id, transaction_type FROM account_activity WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND is_fraudulent = FALSE ORDER BY transaction_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM account_activity ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT account_id, transaction_amount FROM account_activity WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM account_activity WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE
SELECT account_id, transaction_type FROM account_activity ORDER BY transaction_type
SELECT * FROM account_activity WHERE is_fraudulent = FALSE AND transaction_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM account_activities WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM account_activities WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM account_activities WHERE is_suspicious = true ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM account_activities WHERE transaction_type='deposit';
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM account_activities WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM account_activities WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'debit';
SELECT account_holder, account_balance FROM Accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM Transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT transaction_id, suspicious_reason, flag_status FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_balance FROM Accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, suspicious_reason FROM SuspiciousTransactions WHERE flag_status = TRUE AND report_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;

SELECT account_holder, account_type, account_balance FROM Accounts INNER JOIN Transactions ON Accounts.account_id = Transactions.account_id WHERE Transactions.amount < 0 ORDER BY Transactions.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE account_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.transaction_date, c.first_name, c.last_name FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.last_name = 'Smith' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.description, a.account_type, a.balance FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE amount < 0 OR account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS transaction_count, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.account_id = a.account_id JOIN customers c ON a.customer_id = c.customer_id GROUP BY c.first_name, c.last_name HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM account_transactions WHERE account_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM account_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM account_details WHERE account_balance > 1000.00;
SELECT flag_reason FROM transaction_flags WHERE flag_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY flag_timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_timestamp FROM fraud_detection_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM account_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT account_holder_name, account_balance FROM account_details WHERE account_status = 'Active';
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, a.account_holder_name FROM account_transactions t JOIN account_details a ON t.account_id = a.account_id WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(account_balance) AS max_balance FROM account_details;

SELECT t.transaction_id, f.flag_reason FROM suspicious_transactions s JOIN transaction_flags f ON s.flag_id = f.flag_id JOIN account_transactions t ON s.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE f.flag_reason LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY s.flag_timestamp DESC;
